00004  */

00009 /**
00010  * nano-helper for javascript. simply add() javascript in your view, and get() it inside the head-section of your layout
00011  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00012  * @package kata_helper
00013  */
00014 
00015 class JsHelper extends Helper {
00016 
00017     private $jsLines='';
00018 
00019 /**
00020  * add javascript to buffer inside a view
00021  * 
00022  * @param string $js javascript
00023  */
00024     function add($js) {
00025         $this->jsLines = $this->jsLines."\n".$js;
00026     }
00027 
00028 /**
00029  * return buffer. use inside your layout:
00030  * 
00031  * <code>
00032  * ...inside head-element inside your layout
00033  * [script type="application/javascript"]
00034  * echo $js->get();
00035  * [/script]
00036  * </code>
00037  * 
00038  * @return string joined javascript-strings you gave the helper via add()
00039  */
00040     function get() {
00041        return $this->jsLines;
00042     }
00043 
00044 /**
00045  * like get, but compresses the javascript on the fly
00046  *
00047  * @return string compressed javascript
00048  */
00049     function getCompressed() {
00050         return $this->compress($this->jsLines);
00051     }
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * quote string for inclusion in javascript-strings
00055  *
00056  * @param string $s string to quote
00057  * @return string quoted string
00058  */
00059     function quote($s,$withDoubleQuotes=false) {
00060         if ($withDoubleQuotes) {
00061             return str_replace('"','\\"',$s);
00062         }
00063         return str_replace("'","\\'",$s);
00064     }
00065 
00066 /**
00067  * return the given javascript-string in compressed form
00068  * 
00069  * @param string $js your javascript
00070  * @return string your javascript compressed
00071  */
00072     function compress($js) {
00073         $minifyUtil = getUtil('Minify');
00074         return $minifyUtil->js($js);
00075     }
00076 
00077 }
